DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY
DOC.TEXT: Chicago-based Discovery Zone Inc. said it agreed to acquire Leaps & Bounds Inc. from McDonald ' s Corp . for shares of Discovery Zone stock valued at $ 111.4 million . Blockbuster Entertainment Corp . simultaneously agreed to exercise its option to increase its ownership stake in Discovery Zone to 50.1 % from 20 % . . . . Irvine-based Western Digital Corp . said it acquired the assets of Modulinc Systems Inc. from Eldec Corp. , a subsidiary of Crane Co. , for an undisclosed amount in cash and royalties .
